title: Slide Recipe
description: Template-agnostic design intent for a single content slide. Describes WHAT to show and HOW to show it, without template-specific coordinates or colors.

index.description: Slide position (must match Tier 1 outline index)

type.description: Always 'content'. Only content slides have recipes.

message.description: Key message this slide conveys (1 sentence, 40-70 characters recommended)

pattern.description: Layout pattern name from the pattern catalog (e.g. 'three_column', 'process_flow', 'comparison', 'bullet_list')

image_hint.description: Hint for image generation when pattern is 'text_and_image' (Japanese OK)

labels.description: Labels for diagram elements (boxes, cards, flow steps)

adaptation.description: What was changed from the reference and why

reference.description: Optional reference to an existing work this recipe is based on (for imitation/shu-ha-ri workflow)
